word: I have been over the land that has been purchased in Takoma Park, for school and sanitarium purposes. This land is only a short distance from our house. It is very favorably located. . . . God's hand has been in the purchase of this land. It is in every way adapted for the purpose for which it will be used.--Letter 143, 1904. (To Marian Davis, April 27, 1904.)
